content.stem:
Tana fills the prism shown with of liquid.

 

Select the height of the liquid in the prism.

rubric.name: Rubric
rubric.val:
Exemplar:

 

 

For this item, a full-credit response includes

 

  • the correct height (1 point).

readAloud.audioShortDesc: 1 hundred 10 and one half cubic inches,

brailleText.brailleTextString: 1 1 0 the fraction 1 over 2, UNKNOWN raised to the power of 3

content.stem:
Tana llena el prisma que se muestra con 110 ½ pulgadas cúbicas de líquido.

 

Selecciona la altura del líquido en el prisma.

 

Tana fills the prism shown with of liquid.

 

Select the height of the liquid in the prism.

readAloud.audioShortDesc: 1 hundred 10 and one half cubic inches,

brailleText.brailleTextString: 1 1 0 the fraction 1 over 2, UNKNOWN raised to the power of 3
